name: Project Mach
description:
Project Mach is a Sonic fan game. You get to experience the true speed of Sonic The Hedgehog. This is based off of Sonic Runners and the Mach Speed Sections in Sonic 06. This game is a platform game in which the player runs for an infinite amount of time while avoiding obstacles. The player's objective is to reach a high score by surviving for as long as possible.

Controls:

Key A / Left Arrow - Move Left

Key D / Right Arrow - Move Right

Key P / Z - Jump

I don’t own the Sonic franchise. It’s owned by SEGA. I did the programming.

Sprite Credits:

Sonic in Title Screen - Mod.Gen, BananaSkillz

Sonic in Game - Dimps, SEGA, Sonic Team

Cyberspace Background - Dimps, Sonic Team

Rings - Dimps, Sonic Team

Missile - Midio, SEGA, Sonic Mania Team

Spring - Dimps, Sonic Team

Sound Credits:

Rings - Sonic Team, SEGA

Jump - Sonic Team, SEGA

Spring - Sonic Team, SEGA

Lose Rings - Sonic Team, SEGA

Music:

Twinkle Park - Jun Senoue, SEGA, Sonic Team
